description: Try our easy to follow Lemon & Blueberry Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon & Blueberry Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray

recipeInstructions.text: Place a small amount of icing onto a cake board and place one cake on top. Using half the icing, spread over cake layers and stack, adding half the remaining berries between 2 middle layers. Use icing to cover the outside of cake, gently scraping icing around edges of cake to partially cover, creating a naked style. Pile remaining blueberries on top of cake and scatter over coconut before serving.
